name.japanese: スリラーバークの屋敷

description: The large gothic mansion on Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria and his subordinates reside. It serves as the headquarters for the Thriller Bark Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Nami Awakens During Forced Wedding
keyEvents.description: Inside the mansion, Nami wakes up during her forced wedding ceremony to Absalom.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion serves as the setting for Nami's confrontation with and victory over Absalom.

keyEvents.title: Nami Defeats Absalom
keyEvents.description: Nami defeats Absalom with her Thunder Charge: Swing Arm attack inside the mansion.
keyEvents.significance: This marks a significant victory and the conclusion of the Absalom subplot within the mansion.

keyEvents.title: Perona Discovers Mansion Destruction
keyEvents.description: Perona awakens to find that Oars has destroyed much of the mansion during his rampage.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion's destruction prompts Perona to abandon Thriller Bark entirely.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as Thriller Bark Pirates headquarters

description: A massive island-ship in the Florian Triangle, ruled by Gecko Moria. It's the world's largest pirate ship, resembling a floating island with a gothic horror theme.

keyEvents.title: Perona Plans to Abandon Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: After learning of the chaos caused by Oars, Perona decides to flee Thriller Bark, planning to steal the Thousand Sunny and the island's treasure.
keyEvents.significance: This represents a turning point where one of the Mysterious Four abandons Moria's domain.

keyEvents.title: Oars Rampages Through Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: Oars continues his search for the missing Straw Hats across Thriller Bark after defeating most of the crew.
keyEvents.significance: Oars' rampage demonstrates the destructive power of the Special Zombie and the chaos spreading across the island.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Prepare Second Assault
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates regroup on Thriller Bark and prepare their second coordinated attack on Oars.
keyEvents.significance: This sets up the upcoming battle that will determine the fate of their shadows and their escape from Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as Gecko Moria's base of operations

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky using the wood from the legendary Adam Tree. Currently docked at Thriller Bark.

keyEvents.title: Perona Targets the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Perona plans to steal the Thousand Sunny along with Thriller Bark's treasure to escape the island.
keyEvents.significance: This sets up Perona's future encounter at the ship and creates tension about the crew's ability to escape Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Serving as the Straw Hat Pirates' ship
